name: GyRoll
description:
Description

In GyRoll you guide a ball through perilous environments using gyroscope controls while attempting to secure the best possible time.

Can you survive the blistering heat of the volcano? Or the stinging cold of the arctic? How about the corroding acid swamps? Dodge obstacles, solve puzzles and race to the finish in this platforming adventure!

Features
  • Explore 9 harrowing levels over 3 worlds
  • Game-altering pick-ups
  • Tricky physics puzzles
  • Nerve-wracking obstacles
Developers

Artur Wuss
Hayley Hill
Zachariah Tan
Martin Grimshaw
